ti:translation.ti:label: How the Young Man Should Study Poetry
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. I. Babbitt, Frank Cole, translator. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press. London: William Heinemann Ltd. 1927 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: How a Young Man Ought to Hear Poems

ti:edition.ti:label: πῶς δεῖ τὸν νέον ποιημάτων ἀκούειν.
